channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Hole in the grass bank, 5th July
item.description:
Dear Sir or Madam. I Mrs Trotman am writing to you about the stairs going up from silverdale but going into Ringshall road. As they are unsafe for people to walk up. As early people walk up and down the stairs. As there are a few neighbours that are elderly. Also they is going to be a accident to happen. Please can you get some one out to fix the problem many thanks Mrs L Trotman.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Ringshall Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins on Friern Road left on pavement and road, 5th July
item.description:
On one side of Friern Road from Etherow St junction towards Goodrich St junction numerous bins are being left on the pavement and in the road itself between collection days. All the houses have the space to keep them on their own boundaries. Please can these bins be cleared.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 237, Friern Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin is always on path way I’m waiting for a drop down keen and it will impose on my ability to reverse or drive out, 5th July
item.description:
This bin is always hanging on pavement I’m awaiting a drip down keen bit this bin will obstruct my view to carefully move of the drive

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Somersham Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant fly tipping, 5th July
item.description:
This lamppost and the one adjacent are constantly being fly tipped with refuse and a variety of household items, often scattered over the pavement. We have never seen it the perpetrators but are getting fed up as there are new items added every few days.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Northwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large fly tip on the car park, 5th July
item.description:
There is a large fly tip of sofas and broken up furniture at the entrance to the carpark in Montana Gardens next to the first block of flats. The sofas appeared first about a week ago followed by broken up furniture. There is a CCTV camera on this carpark so you may be able to see who dumped it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montana Gardens, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish consistently left outside 50A Molyneux St, 5th July
item.description:
There are always bags of rubbish, household items, takeaway bags left behind these railings or at the kerb by this building. The presence of rubbish is consistent with rubbish left weekly if not daily. The photos shared were taken one week apart.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Molyneux Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: 2 trees nees pruning, 5th July
item.description:
2 trees which need pruning on the junction of Polperro Close and the path leading to Poverest Rec. When the trees along the path leading from Perry Hall Road/Chislehurst Road are pollarded the two trees on the opposite side of the path way leading to Polperro Close always get missed out with the result that they are getting larger. Could a surveyor come and look at them, please and hopefully arrange for these two trees to be pruned.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushey Avenue, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
